  the materail parameters of the  1th filter

  atomic number =   14.00      angle =   9.18degree

 thickness     =    0.00cm; 

 the input power is   0.2392 kw the output power is   0.2331 kw
 the absor.power is   0.0060 kw

 the back  power is   0.0018 kw the trans. power is  -0.0006 kw
  by radiative decay process * wk

 the back  power is   0.0000 kw the trans. power is   0.0000 kw
  by compton process 

 the back  power is   0.0000 kw the trans. power is   0.0000 kw
  by rayleigh  process
